events.text: Start of the game. Russia needs victory, for Germany draw will be enough.
ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡º Russia are through if they win and out with any other result. They top the group if they win and Sweden do not. - UEFA.com
Peter scores from the penalty spot

ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª Germany are through with a draw. If Germany lose, they need Sweden to also be beaten, when second place (meaning a game against Denmark rather than the Netherlsnds) will be decided by overall goal difference, then overall goals scored, then disciplinary. If all those things are level, Germany have the superior coefficient. - UEFA.com
Full time. Germany is going through.
ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡º In this group, Russia needed to pull off a miracle to go through. The miracle did not happen. And although they lost to Sweden and Germany, they certianly did not let their fans down.
ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª Probably nobody is surprised by that. Germany, eight-time Euro winner, is finishing first in Group B.
